title: Is this a bug?
body:
if LB hits you with her chains, then during the duration her passive activates, she becomes stealthed and so do the chains, and you have no indication that you have been chained, (unless you saw it hit) and then when the damage applies for the second time, it appears like its coming out of no where.
this seems contradictory to RIOT's view of clarity

replies.body: Lb is strong as hell. Therefor she can do what she wants. Leblanc didn't choose the thug life the thug life chose her
RIOT's view of clarity is actually 40% maximum mana, dur

But.. You saw the chain hit.

What is the confusion?

By that logic we shouldn't have any particle effects on any delayed abilities, no tether on morg's ult, no little 'you're gunna die in a minute' thing for zed's ult, no particle effect on Lee's Q when you get hit by it, (you saw the ability hitting you, therefore why have a particle)
